entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
